UPDATE AI_BOARD_CONTENT SET
BOARD_NO = #{boardNo},
ORG_BOARD_CONTENT_NO = #{orgBoardContentNo},
TITLE = #{title},
CONTENT = #{content},
SEC_YN = #{secYn},
UPD_DATE = now() WHERE BOARD_CONTENT_NO = #{boardContentNo}
UPDATE AI_BOARD_CONTENT SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_CONTENT_NO = #{boardContentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_CONTENT_NO AS boardContentNo, A.USER_NO AS userNo, A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, B.USER_NAME AS userName, A.ORG_BOARD_CONTENT_NO AS orgBoardContentNo, A.TITLE AS title, A.CONTENT AS content, IFNULL(A.SEC_YN ,'N') AS secYn, A.VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt, IF((DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE,'%Y%m%d')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d')),DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE,'%H:%i:%S'),DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE,'%Y.%m.%d') ) AS regDate, A.UPD_DATE AS updDate, (SELECT count(BOARD_CONTENT_NO) FROM AI_BOARD_CONTENT ABC WHERE ABC.ORG_BOARD_CONTENT_NO = A.BOARD_CONTENT_NO) AS replyCnt, A.CONTENT_GROUP AS contentGroup FROM AI_BOARD_CONTENT A INNER JOIN AI_USER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE BOARD_CONTENT_NO = #{boardContentNo}

SELECT A.DATA_NO as dataNo, B.CODE_NAME as codeName, A.SPORTS_TYPE_CODE as sportsTypeCode, A.ACT_CODE as actCode, A.FILE_URL as fileUrl, A.FILE_NAME as fileName, A.THUM_IMG_URL as thumImgUrl, A.PLAY_TIME as playTime, A.REG_DATE as regDate, A.UPD_DATE as updDate FROM AI_SPORTS_DATA A INNER JOIN AI_COMMONCODE B ON A.SPORTS_TYPE_CODE = B.CODE WHERE A.SPORTS_TYPE_CODE = #{sportsTypeCode} AND A.ACT_CODE = #{actCode} ORDER BY A.DATA_NO DESC

SELECT A.BOARD_CONTENT_NO AS boardContentNo, A.USER_NO AS userNo, B.USER_NAME AS userName, A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, A.ORG_BOARD_CONTENT_NO AS orgBoardContentNo, A.TITLE AS title, A.CONTENT AS content, IFNULL(A.SEC_YN ,'N') AS secYn, A.VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt, IF((DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE,'%Y%m%d')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d')),DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE,'%H:%i:%S'),DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE,'%Y.%m.%d') ) AS regDate, A.UPD_DATE AS updDate, (SELECT count(BOARD_CONTENT_NO) FROM AI_BOARD_CONTENT ABC WHERE ABC.ORG_BOARD_CONTENT_NO = A.BOARD_CONTENT_NO) AS replyCnt, A.CONTENT_GROUP AS contentGroup FROM AI_BOARD_CONTENT A INNER JOIN AI_USER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE ORG_BOARD_CONTENT_NO = #{boardContentNo}
